OOC: lol! nice explanation!

Bic:

Dreadplague cocked one eyebrow.

Dread: They actually let you go?!? I don't believe that!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Synergy::
> 
> "Well, I was a guardian - until I quit.  Not that it's any of your 
> beeswax."
> 
> OOC: Just what the Tripreds need, huh?  A powerhouse with permanent 
> PMS. ;p
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > : : Darkangel : :
> > Darkangel: Are you really a guardian robot?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> 
> "Damn slaggin' right I wouldn't worry. The name's Synergy." She 
> flexes her powerful three-pronged claw and checks the arm over. 
> Despite the rough landing, Synergy doesn't seem all that hurt, as she 
> test-fires the napalm cannon built into the center of her claw - 
> reducing a nearby shrub to a scorch mark on the ground. "Hmmm. 
> Well, at least I didn't burn the darn thing out."
> 
> >  Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Taken a bit by surprise, 
> Dreadplague transforms to bot mode, leaving
> > her wings off to form only a cape, not a full cloak.
> > 
> > Dreadplague: Mmm... I think that even if we said we wished you harm,
> > you would not even worry. Let's keep this friendly, then. I am
> > Dreadplague. This is my companion Darkangel. We are Tripredacus. Can
> > we know what your name is?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > ???????::
> > > 
> > > "Hot?  I'll show you hot!"  The still-smoldering craft suddenly 
> comes 
> > > to life, transforming into a somewhat blocky humanoid form.  The 
> > > newcomer is a midget - for a Guardian Robot.  16 feet tall, and 
> > > clearly heavily armed and armored, this is one dangerous femme.  
> And 
> > > she's in a foul mood.  "Who are you?"
> > > 
> > > Lacking any insignia, the only clue to alignment is her 
> structural 
> > > resemblance to the legendary Omega Supreme.  Her color pattern is 
> > > much different: mostly black, with deep blue trim.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > > 
> > > > : : Darkangel : :
> > > > Darkangel transformes to bot mode, landing next to Dreadplague.
> > > > Darkangel: I cant see any offhand. It's still to hot to touch 
> or 
> > > get close too.
> > > >  Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:The lady transforms to wyvern 
> mode 
> > > and lands near to the object.
> > > > Hopping around, she tries to look for anything that might 
> reveal its
> > > > nature but finds nothing of the sort.
> > > > 
> > > > Dreadplague: There is definitely something Cybertronian on that 
> > > thing,
> > > > but I can't find it. Do you see any hatch or airlock?
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > 
> > > > > : : Drakangel : :
> > > > > He flies after the point of empact.
> > > > > Darkangel: Yeah, I'm picking something up. It could ahve been 
> a 
> > > pod
> > > > or a ship. C'mon Dreadplague, lets check this out.
> > > > >  Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Dreadplague: Slag! What was 
> > > that?!?
> > > > > 
> > > > > She moves in closer but was still at a good distance.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Dreadplague: Darkangel, do you sense this too? It's almost 
> like 
> > > the
> > > > > thing has an energy signature of its own!
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" 
> <cardhead649@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > > OOC: How about splitting the difference down the middle 
> > > somewhere?
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > ???????::
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Out in space, a small, damaged rocket ship plunges down 
> into 
> > > the 
> > > > > > atmosphere.  The heat of re-entry turns the artificial 
> meteor 
> > > into a 
> > > > > > flaming comet as it plows into the ground ahead of the two 
> > > Tripred 
> > > > > > warriors.
> > > > > >

> <roborick007@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > > >

> should 
> > > be 
> > > > > > around the battle that is stretching the entire distance 
> from

> > > > > > Maxi and Pred base anyway.
> > > > > > > : : Darkangel : :
> > > > > > > He speeds up to follow her.
> > > > > > > Darkangel: Looks like one hell of a fight going on...
> > > > > > >  Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Dreadplague: Alright, 
> then, 
> > > let's 
> > > > > > go check it out.
> > > > > > >
